price: Wanasema: Basi marejeo hayo ni yenye khasara!
footnotes: Wanasema, kwa kukanya na kejeli: Kurejea huko kama kukitokea basi ni marejeo ya khasara, na sisi si watu wa kukhasiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
